text: Sir James Dyson (born 2 May 1947) is a British inventor, industrial design engineer and founder of the Dyson company. He is best known as the inventor of the Dual Cyclone bagless vacuum cleaner. His net worth is Â£7.8 billion. He was the Provost of the Royal College of Art from August 2011 to July 2017. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:British mechanical engineers Category:British inventors Category:British businesspeople Category:People from Norfolk Category:Industrial engineers
